trans-unit.source: Provides a stream used for client-server communication that uses the Secure Socket Layer (SSL) security protocol to authenticate the server and optionally the client.
trans-unit.target: 提供用於用戶端與伺服器通訊的資料流，其會使用安全通訊端層 (SSL) 安全性通訊協定來驗證伺服器及用戶端 (選擇性)。

trans-unit.source: SSL protocols help to provide confidentiality and integrity checking for messages transmitted using an <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>.
trans-unit.target: SSL 通訊協定協助提供機密性和完整性檢查的訊息傳輸使用<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>。

trans-unit.source: An SSL connection, such as that provided by <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>, should be used when communicating sensitive information between a client and a server.
trans-unit.target: SSL 連接，例如提供的<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>，應該進行時，使用通訊用戶端與伺服器之間的機密資訊。

trans-unit.source: Using an <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> helps to prevent anyone from reading and tampering with information while it is in transit on the network.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>可協助防止任何人讀取和竄改時它是在網路上傳輸的資訊。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> instance transmits data using a stream that you supply when creating the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>執行個體使用的資料流建立時所提供的資料傳輸<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>。

trans-unit.source: When you supply this underlying stream, you have the option to specify whether closing the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> also closes the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: 當您提供此基礎資料流時，您可以指定是否關閉<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>也會關閉基礎資料流。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> class is used with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> classes.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>類別會搭配<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.GetStream%2A> method provides a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> suitable for use with the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.GetStream%2A>方法提供<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>適合搭配<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>類別。

trans-unit.source: After creating an <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>, the server and optionally, the client must be authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 在建立之後<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>，必須驗證伺服器和 （選擇性） 用戶端。

trans-unit.source: The server must provide an X509 certificate that establishes proof of its identity and can request that the client also do so.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器必須提供 X509 憑證，會建立其識別身分的證明，並可以要求的用戶端也會如此。

trans-unit.source: Authentication must be performed before transmitting information using an <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>.
trans-unit.target: 必須執行驗證，再傳輸資訊使用<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>。

trans-unit.source: Clients initiate authentication using the synchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A> methods, which block until the authentication completes, or the asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> methods, which do not block waiting for the authentication to complete.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端會起始驗證使用同步<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>方法會封鎖，直到完成驗證，或非同步<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>方法，不會封鎖等候完成驗證。

trans-unit.source: Servers initiate authentication using the synchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> or asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器會起始驗證使用同步<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>或非同步<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Both client and server must initiate the authentication.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端和伺服器都必須初始化驗證。

trans-unit.source: The authentication is handled by the Security Support Provider (SSPI) channel provider.
trans-unit.target: 驗證是由安全性支援提供者 (SSPI) 通道提供者處理。

trans-unit.source: The client is given an opportunity to control validation of the server's certificate by specifying a <xref:System.Net.Security.RemoteCertificateValidationCallback> delegate when creating an <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端被賦予控制藉由指定之伺服器的憑證驗證的機會<xref:System.Net.Security.RemoteCertificateValidationCallback>委派建立時<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>。

trans-unit.source: The server can also control validation by supplying a <xref:System.Net.Security.RemoteCertificateValidationCallback> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器也可以藉由提供控制驗證<xref:System.Net.Security.RemoteCertificateValidationCallback>委派。

trans-unit.source: The method referenced by the delegate includes the remote party's certificate and any errors SSPI encountered while validating the certificate.
trans-unit.target: 委派所參考的方法包括遠端合作對象憑證和 SSPI 驗證憑證時所發生的任何錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the server specifies a delegate, the delegate's method is invoked regardless of whether the server requested client authentication.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，是否伺服器指定委派，委派的方法會叫用不論伺服器要求用戶端驗證。

trans-unit.source: If the server did not request client authentication, the server's delegate method receives a null certificate and an empty array of certificate errors.
trans-unit.target: 如果伺服器未要求用戶端驗證，伺服器的委派方法，會收到 null 憑證及憑證錯誤的空陣列。

trans-unit.source: If the server requires client authentication, the client must specify one or more certificates for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 如果伺服器需要用戶端驗證，用戶端必須指定一個或多個憑證進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: If the client has more than one certificate, the client can provide a <xref:System.Net.Security.LocalCertificateSelectionCallback> delegate to select the correct certificate for the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果用戶端有一個以上的憑證，可以提供用戶端<xref:System.Net.Security.LocalCertificateSelectionCallback>選取正確的憑證伺服器的委派。

trans-unit.source: The client's certificates must be located in the current user's "My" certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端的憑證必須位於目前使用者的"My"憑證存放區。

trans-unit.source: Client authentication via certificates is not supported for the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols.Ssl2> (SSL version 2) protocol.
trans-unit.target: 不支援透過憑證的用戶端驗證<xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols.Ssl2>(第 2 版 SSL) 通訊協定。

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive a <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>, and the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> is no longer useable.
trans-unit.target: 如果驗證失敗時，您會收到<xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>，而<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>是無法再使用。

trans-unit.source: You should close this object and remove all references to it so that it can be collected by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 您應該關閉這個物件，並移除所有參考，讓它可以收集在記憶體回收行程。

trans-unit.source: When the authentication process, also known as the SSL handshake, succeeds, the identity of the server (and optionally, the client) is established and the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> can be used by the client and server to exchange messages.
trans-unit.target: 當驗證程序，也稱為 SSL 交握，成功時，建立伺服器 （和 （選擇性） 用戶端） 的身分識別和<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>可以由用戶端和伺服器用來交換訊息。

trans-unit.source: Before sending or receiving information, the client and server should check the security services and levels provided by the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> to determine whether the protocol, algorithms, and strengths selected meet their requirements for integrity and confidentiality.
trans-unit.target: 之前傳送或接收資訊時，用戶端和伺服器應檢查的安全性服務和所提供的層級<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>來判斷通訊協定、 演算法和優勢選取符合其需求的完整性與機密性。

trans-unit.source: If the current settings are not sufficient, the stream should be closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的設定不足時，必須先關閉資料流。

trans-unit.source: You can check the security services provided by the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> using the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsSigned%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以檢查所提供的安全性服務<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>使用<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsEncrypted%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsSigned%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the elements that report the cryptographic settings used for authentication, encryption and data signing.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示報告用於驗證、 加密和資料簽章的密碼編譯設定的項目。

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: 元素

trans-unit.source: Members
trans-unit.target: 成員

trans-unit.source: The security protocol used to authenticate the server and, optionally, the client.
trans-unit.target: 用來驗證伺服器和 （選擇性） 用戶端的安全性通訊協定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.SslProtocol%2A> property and the associated <xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.SslProtocol%2A>屬性和相關聯<xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The key exchange algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 金鑰交換演算法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.KeyExchangeAlgorithm%2A> property and the associated <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExchangeAlgorithmType> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.KeyExchangeAlgorithm%2A>屬性和相關聯<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExchangeAlgorithmType>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The message integrity algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 訊息完整性演算法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.HashAlgorithm%2A> property and the associated <xref:System.Security.Authentication.HashAlgorithmType> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.HashAlgorithm%2A>屬性和相關聯<xref:System.Security.Authentication.HashAlgorithmType>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The message confidentiality algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 訊息機密性演算法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.CipherAlgorithm%2A> property and the associated <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.CipherAlgorithm%2A>屬性和相關聯<xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The strengths of the selected algorithms.
trans-unit.target: 選取演算法的優點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.KeyExchangeStrength%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.HashStrength%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.CipherStrength%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.KeyExchangeStrength%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.HashStrength%2A>，和<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.CipherStrength%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: After a successful authentication, you can send data using the synchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.Write%2A> or asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginWrite%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 成功驗證之後，您可以傳送資料，使用同步<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.Write%2A>或非同步<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginWrite%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can receive data using the synchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.Read%2A> or asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginRead%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 您可以接收其資料同步使用<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.Read%2A>或非同步<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginRead%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you specified to the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.%23ctor%2A> that the underlying stream should be left open, you are responsible for closing that stream when you are done using it.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定以<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.%23ctor%2A>，基礎資料流應該保持開啟狀態，您必須負責完成時關閉資料流中使用它。

trans-unit.source: If the application that creates the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> object runs with the credentials of a Normal user, the application will not be able to access certificates installed in the local machine store unless permission has been explicitly given to the user to do so.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式會建立<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>物件以一般使用者的認證執行，應用程式不能存取憑證安裝在本機電腦存放區中，除非權限已經明確提供給使用者若要這樣做。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> assumes that a timeout along with any other <xref:System.IO.IOException> when one is thrown from the inner stream will be treated as fatal by its caller.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> 假設逾時以及任何其他<xref:System.IO.IOException>當其中一個會擲回，從內部資料流將被視為嚴重由其呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Reusing a <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> instance after a timeout will return garbage.
trans-unit.target: 重複使用<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>之後逾時將會傳回記憶體回收執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An application should <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A> the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> and throw an exception in these cases.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式應該<xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A><xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>和在這些情況下擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework 4.6 includes a new security feature that blocks insecure cipher and hashing algorithms for connections.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 4.6 包含新的安全性功能會封鎖不安全的加密與雜湊演算法的連線。

trans-unit.source: Applications using TLS/SSL through APIs such as HttpClient, HttpWebRequest, FTPClient, SmtpClient, SslStream, etc. and targeting .NET Framework 4.6 get the more-secure behavior by default.
trans-unit.target: 使用 TLS/SSL 透過例如 HttpClient、 HttpWebRequest、 FTPClient、 SmtpClient、 SslStream 」 等的 Api，並以.NET Framework 4.6 為目標的應用程式預設會取得更安全的行為。

trans-unit.source: Developers may want to opt out of this behavior in order to maintain interoperability with their existing SSL3 services OR TLS w/ RC4 services.
trans-unit.target: 開發人員可能想要取消這個行為，以維護與 RC4 服務以其現有 SSL3 服務或 TLS 的互通性。

trans-unit.source: [This article](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/3069494) explains how to modify your code so that the new behavior is disabled.
trans-unit.target: [這篇文章](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/3069494)說明如何修改您的程式碼，讓新的行為會停用。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework 4.7 adds new overloads for the methods that authenticate SslStreams that do not specify a TLS version, but instead use the TLS version defined as the system default in [SCHANNEL](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/aa380123.aspx).
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 4.7 新增新的驗證 SslStreams 未指定 TLS 版本，但改為使用 TLS 版本定義中的系統預設值為方法的多載[SCHANNEL](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/aa380123.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: Use these methods in your app as a way to be able to later modify the defaults as TLS version best practice changes over time, without the need to rebuild and redeploy your app.
trans-unit.target: 在您的應用程式中使用這些方法，以便可以稍後修改預設值為 TLS 版本最佳作法是變更一段時間，而不需要重建並重新部署您的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates creating an <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> that uses the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> class to communicate with clients.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>使用<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>類別與用戶端通訊。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates creating a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> that uses the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> class to communicate with a server.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>使用<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>類別來與伺服器通訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: To prevent the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> from closing the stream that you supply, use the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>關閉您提供的資料流，從使用<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object used by the <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> for sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件，由 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> 用來傳送及接收資料。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" />，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If a value is not specified in the configuration file for encryptionpolicy, the <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy> defaults to <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy.RequireEncryption?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> instance that is constructed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 encryptionpolicy，組態檔中未指定值<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy>預設為<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy.RequireEncryption?displayProperty=nameWithType>如<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>建構的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The use of the Null cipher is required when the encryption policy is set to <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy.NoEncryption?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Null 編碼器時，需要加密原則設為<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy.NoEncryption?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="innerStream" /> is not readable.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="innerStream" /> 不可讀取。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="innerStream" /> is not writable.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="innerStream" /> 不可寫入。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="innerStream" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="innerStream" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="innerStream" /> is equal to <see cref="F:System.IO.Stream.Null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="innerStream" /> 等於 <see cref="F:System.IO.Stream.Null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object used by the <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> for sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件，由 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> 用來傳送及接收資料。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates the closure behavior of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object used by the <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> for sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，表示 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 用來傳送和接收資料之 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> 物件的結束行為。

trans-unit.source: This parameter indicates if the inner stream is left open.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數指出內部資料流是否保持開啟狀態。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> and stream closure behavior.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> 和資料流結束行為，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When you specify `true` for the `leaveStreamOpen` parameter, closing the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> has no effect on the `innerStream` stream; you must explicitly close `innerStream` when you no longer need it.
trans-unit.target: 當您指定`true`如`leaveStreamOpen`參數，關閉<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>沒有任何作用`innerStream`串流處理; 您必須明確地關閉`innerStream`當您不再需要它。

trans-unit.source: If a value is not specified in the configuration file for encryptionpolicy, the <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy> defaults to <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy.RequireEncryption?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> instance that is constructed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 encryptionpolicy，組態檔中未指定值<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy>預設為<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy.RequireEncryption?displayProperty=nameWithType>如<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>建構的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The use of the Null cipher is required when the encryption policy is set to <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy.NoEncryption?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Null 編碼器時，需要加密原則設為<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy.NoEncryption?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates calling this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="innerStream" /> is not readable.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="innerStream" /> 不可讀取。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="innerStream" /> is not writable.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="innerStream" /> 不可寫入。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object used by the <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> for sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件，由 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> 用來傳送及接收資料。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates the closure behavior of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object used by the <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> for sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，表示 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 用來傳送和接收資料之 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> 物件的結束行為。

trans-unit.source: This parameter indicates if the inner stream is left open.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數指出內部資料流是否保持開啟狀態。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.RemoteCertificateValidationCallback" /> delegate responsible for validating the certificate supplied by the remote party.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.RemoteCertificateValidationCallback" /> 委派，負責驗證遠端群體所提供的憑證。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />, stream closure behavior and certificate validation delegate.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" />、資料流結束行為以及憑證驗證委派，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When you specify `true` for the `leaveStreamOpen` parameter, closing the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> has no effect on the `innerStream` stream; you must explicitly close `innerStream` when you no longer need it.
trans-unit.target: 當您指定`true`如`leaveStreamOpen`參數，關閉<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>沒有任何作用`innerStream`串流處理; 您必須明確地關閉`innerStream`當您不再需要它。

trans-unit.source: The `userCertificateValidationCallback` delegate's `certificateErrors` argument contains any Windows error codes returned by the channel Security Support Provider Interface (SSPI).
trans-unit.target: `userCertificateValidationCallback`代理人`certificateErrors`引數包含通道安全性支援提供者介面 (SSPI) 所傳回的任何 Windows 錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: The return value of the method invoked by the `userCertificateValidationCallback` delegate determines whether authentication succeeds.
trans-unit.target: 叫用之方法的傳回值`userCertificateValidationCallback`委派可讓您判斷驗證是否成功。

trans-unit.source: The security protocol and cryptographic algorithms are already selected when the `userCertificateValidationCallback` delegate's method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 安全性通訊協定和密碼編譯演算法已時選取`userCertificateValidationCallback`叫用委派的方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use the method to determine whether the selected cryptographic algorithms and strengths are sufficient for your application.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此方法來判斷是否滿足您的應用程式選取密碼編譯演算法和優點。

trans-unit.source: If not, the method should return `false` to prevent the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> from being created.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是，這個方法應傳回`false`防止<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>建立。

trans-unit.source: If a value is not specified in the configuration file for encryptionpolicy, the <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy> defaults to <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy.RequireEncryption?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> instance that is constructed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 encryptionpolicy，組態檔中未指定值<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy>預設為<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy.RequireEncryption?displayProperty=nameWithType>如<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>建構的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The use of the Null cipher is required when the encryption policy is set to <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy.NoEncryption?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Null 編碼器時，需要加密原則設為<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy.NoEncryption?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The Framework caches SSL sessions as they are created and attempts to reuse a cached session for a new request, if possible.
trans-unit.target: 架構快取的 SSL 工作階段建立時，並嘗試盡可能重複使用快取的工作階段為新的要求。

trans-unit.source: When attempting to reuse an SSL session, the Framework uses the first element of <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates%2A> (if there is one), or tries to reuse an anonymous sessions if <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates%2A> is empty.
trans-unit.target: 當嘗試重複使用的 SSL 工作階段，架構會使用第一個項目<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates%2A>（如果有一個），或嘗試重複使用匿名的工作階段，如果<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates%2A>是空的。

trans-unit.source: Client certificates are not supported in the SSL version 2 protocol.
trans-unit.target: SSL 版本 2 通訊協定不支援用戶端憑證。

trans-unit.source: When you specify `true` for the `leaveStreamOpen` parameter, closing the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> has no effect on the `innerStream` stream; you must explicitly close `innerStream` when you no longer need it.

trans-unit.target: `userCertificateValidationCallback`代理人`certificateErrors`引數包含通道安全性支援提供者介面 (SSPI) 所傳回的任何 Windows 錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: The return value of the method invoked by the `userCertificateValidationCallback` delegate determines whether authentication succeeds.

trans-unit.source: The security protocol and cryptographic algorithms are already selected when the `userCertificateValidationCallback` delegate's method is invoked.

trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此方法來判斷是否滿足您的應用程式選取密碼編譯演算法和優點。

trans-unit.source: If not, the method should return `false` to prevent the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> from being created.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是，這個方法應傳回`false`防止<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>建立。

trans-unit.source: The `userCertificateSelectionCallback` delegate is useful when your application has multiple certificates and must dynamically choose a certificate.
trans-unit.target: `userCertificateSelectionCallback`委派在您的應用程式有多個憑證，而且必須以動態方式選擇憑證時相當實用。

trans-unit.source: Certificates in the "MY" store are passed to the method invoked by the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 在"MY"存放區中的憑證會傳遞至委派所叫用的方法。

trans-unit.source: If a value is not specified in the configuration file for encryptionpolicy, the <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy> defaults to <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy.RequireEncryption?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> instance that is constructed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 encryptionpolicy，組態檔中未指定值<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy>預設為<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy.RequireEncryption?displayProperty=nameWithType>如<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>建構的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The use of the Null cipher is required when the encryption policy is set to <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy.NoEncryption?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Null 編碼器時，需要加密原則設為<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy.NoEncryption?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: When attempting to reuse an SSL session, the Framework uses the first element of P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates (if there is one), or tries to reuse an anonymous sessions if P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates is empty.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試重複使用的 SSL 工作階段，架構會使用 P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates （如果有的話），第一個項目，或嘗試重複使用匿名的工作階段，如果 P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates 是空白。

trans-unit.source: Authenticate the client side of a client-server connection.
trans-unit.target: 驗證主從架構連接的用戶端。

trans-unit.source: The name of the server that shares this <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" />.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器的名稱，共用這個 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" />。

trans-unit.source: Called by clients to authenticate the server and optionally the client in a client-server connection.
trans-unit.target: 已由用戶端呼叫來在用戶端與伺服器連線中驗證伺服器和用戶端 (選擇性)。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[sslprotocols-none](~/includes/sslprotocols-none-md.md)] No client certificates are used in the authentication.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[sslprotocols-none](~/includes/sslprotocols-none-md.md)] 任何用戶端憑證不用於驗證。

trans-unit.source: The certificate revocation list is not checked during authentication.
trans-unit.target: 在驗證期間，不會檢查憑證撤銷清單。

trans-unit.source: The value specified for `targetHost` must match the name on the server's certificate.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值`targetHost`必須符合伺服器憑證的名稱。

trans-unit.source: When authentication succeeds, you must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services are used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>.
trans-unit.target: 當驗證成功時，您必須檢查<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsEncrypted%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsSigned%2A>屬性，以便判斷哪些安全性服務由<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A> property to determine whether mutual authentication occurred.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>屬性來判斷是否發生過相互驗證。

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive a <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>, and this <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> is no longer useable.
trans-unit.target: 如果驗證失敗時，您會收到<xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>，而這<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>是無法再使用。

trans-unit.source: You should close this object and remove all references to it so that it can be collected by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 您應該關閉這個物件，並移除所有參考，讓它可以收集在記憶體回收行程。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="targetHost" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetHost" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The authentication failed and left this object in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: 驗證失敗，且此物件處於不穩定的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Authentication has already occurred.
trans-unit.target: 已經進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Authentication is already in progress.
trans-unit.target: 驗證已在進行中。

trans-unit.target: 驗證程序會使用指定的憑證集合物件和系統預設的 SSL 通訊協定。

trans-unit.source: When authentication succeeds, you must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services are used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>.

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A> property to determine whether mutual authentication occurred.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>屬性來判斷是否發生過相互驗證。

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive a <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>, and this <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> is no longer useable.
trans-unit.target: 如果驗證失敗時，您會收到<xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>，而這<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>是無法再使用。

trans-unit.source: Called by servers to authenticate the server and optionally the client in a client-server connection as an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 由伺服器呼叫做為非同步作業，以驗證用戶端與伺服器連接中的伺服器，並選擇性地驗證用戶端。

trans-unit.source: The certificate used to authenticate the server.
trans-unit.target: 憑證，用於驗證伺服器。

trans-unit.source: Called by servers to authenticate the server and optionally the client in a client-server connection using the specified certificate as an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 由伺服器呼叫做為非同步作業，以使用指定的憑證來驗證用戶端與伺服器連接中的伺服器，並選擇性地驗證用戶端。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />。

trans-unit.source: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

trans-unit.source: This method authenticates using <xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols.Default>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會驗證使用<xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols.Default>。

trans-unit.source: The certificate revocation list is not checked during authentication.
trans-unit.target: 在驗證期間，不會檢查憑證撤銷清單。

trans-unit.source: The client is not required to provide a certificate for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端不是需要提供憑證進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive a <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>, and this <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> is no longer useable.
trans-unit.target: 如果驗證失敗時，您會收到<xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>，而這<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>是無法再使用。

trans-unit.source: Begins an operation to authenticate the client side of a client-server connection.
trans-unit.target: 開始作業以驗證用戶端與伺服器連接中的用戶端。

trans-unit.source: The overloads of this method do not block while authentication is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 驗證正在進行時，此方法的多載不會封鎖。

trans-unit.source: To block while waiting for the authentication to complete, use one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要封鎖等候驗證完成時，使用其中一種<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The name of the server that shares this <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" />.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器的名稱，共用這個 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that references the method to invoke when the authentication is complete.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 委派，會於驗證完成時參考要叫用的方法。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that contains information about the operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義物件，包含作業的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: This object is passed to the <c>asyncCallback</c> delegate when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 作業完成時，這個物件會傳遞給 <c>asyncCallback</c> 委派。

trans-unit.source: Called by clients to begin an asynchronous operation to authenticate the server and optionally the client.
trans-unit.target: 由用戶端呼叫以開始非同步作業，驗證伺服器及 (選擇性地驗證) 用戶端。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object that indicates the status of the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 物件，表示非同步作業的狀態。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[sslprotocols-none](~/includes/sslprotocols-none-md.md)] No client certificates are used in the authentication.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[sslprotocols-none](~/includes/sslprotocols-none-md.md)] 任何用戶端憑證不用於驗證。

trans-unit.source: The certificate revocation list is not checked during authentication.
trans-unit.target: 在驗證期間，不會檢查憑證撤銷清單。

trans-unit.source: The value specified for `targetHost` must match the name on the server's certificate.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值`targetHost`必須符合伺服器憑證的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous authentication operation must be completed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.EndAuthenticateAsClient%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 完成非同步的驗證作業，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.EndAuthenticateAsClient%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，方法由叫用`asyncCallback`委派。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block while the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 在作業完成時，這個方法不會封鎖。

trans-unit.source: To block until the operation completes, use one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A> method overloads.
trans-unit.target: 若要封鎖直到作業完成為止，使用其中一種<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)
trans-unit.target: 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步呼叫同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to handle the server side of authenticating a client-server connection.
trans-unit.target: 開始非同步作業以處理驗證用戶端與伺服器連接的伺服器端。

trans-unit.source: The overloads of this method do not block while authentication is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 驗證正在進行時，此方法的多載不會封鎖。

trans-unit.source: To block while waiting for the authentication to complete, use one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要封鎖等候驗證完成時，使用其中一種<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The X509Certificate used to authenticate the server.
trans-unit.target: X509Certificate 可用來驗證伺服器。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that references the method to invoke when the authentication is complete.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 委派，會於驗證完成時參考要叫用的方法。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that contains information about the operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義物件，包含作業的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: This object is passed to the <c>asyncCallback</c> delegate when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 作業完成時，這個物件會傳遞給 <c>asyncCallback</c> 委派。

trans-unit.source: Called by servers to begin an asynchronous operation to authenticate the client and optionally the server in a client-server connection.
trans-unit.target: 由伺服器呼叫以開始非同步作業，驗證用戶端與伺服器連接中的用戶端及 (選擇性地驗證) 伺服器。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object indicating the status of the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 物件，指出非同步作業的狀態。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[sslprotocols-none](~/includes/sslprotocols-none-md.md)] The certificate revocation list is not checked during authentication.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[sslprotocols-none](~/includes/sslprotocols-none-md.md)] 在驗證期間，不會檢查憑證撤銷清單。

trans-unit.source: The client is not required to provide a certificate for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端不是需要提供憑證進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous authentication operation must be completed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.EndAuthenticateAsClient%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 完成非同步的驗證作業，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.EndAuthenticateAsClient%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，方法由叫用`asyncCallback`委派。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block while the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 在作業完成時，這個方法不會封鎖。

trans-unit.source: To block until the operation completes, use one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A> method overloads.
trans-unit.target: 若要封鎖直到作業完成為止，使用其中一種<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)
trans-unit.target: 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步呼叫同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>, this <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> is no longer useable.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>，這個<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>是無法再使用。

trans-unit.source: You should close this object and remove all references to it so that it can be collected by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 您應該關閉這個物件，並移除所有參考，讓它可以收集在記憶體回收行程。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="serverCertificate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="serverCertificate" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The authentication failed and left this object in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: 驗證失敗，且此物件處於不穩定的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Authentication has already occurred.
trans-unit.target: 已經進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Client authentication using this <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> was tried previously.

trans-unit.source: -or-
Authentication is already in progress.
trans-unit.target: 驗證已在進行中。

trans-unit.source: This object has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 此物件已關閉。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="Overload:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer" /> method is not supported on Windows 95, Windows 98, or Windows Millennium.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows 95、Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium 上不支援 <see cref="Overload:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The X509Certificate used to authenticate the server.
trans-unit.target: X509Certificate 可用來驗證伺服器。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that specifies whether the client is asked for a certificate for authentication.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，指定是否需要求用戶端提供憑證以進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: Note that this is only a request -- if no certificate is provided, the server still accepts the connection request.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，這只是一個要求 -- 如果未提供任何憑證，伺服器仍然會接受連接要求。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that specifies whether the certificate revocation list is checked during authentication.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，指定是否要在驗證期間檢查憑證撤銷清單。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that references the method to invoke when the authentication is complete.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 委派，會於驗證完成時參考要叫用的方法。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that contains information about the operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義物件，包含作業的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: This object is passed to the <c>asyncCallback</c> delegate when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 作業完成時，這個物件會傳遞給 <c>asyncCallback</c> 委派。

trans-unit.source: Called by servers to begin an asynchronous operation to authenticate the server and optionally the client using the specified certificates and requirements, and the system default security protocol.
trans-unit.target: 已由伺服器呼叫來開始非同步作業，以使用指定的憑證、需求及系統預設安全性通訊協定來驗證伺服器和用戶端 (選擇性)。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object that indicates the status of the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 物件，表示非同步作業的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous authentication operation must be completed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.EndAuthenticateAsServer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 完成非同步的驗證作業，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.EndAuthenticateAsServer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block while the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 在作業完成時，這個方法不會封鎖。

trans-unit.source: To block until the operation completes, use one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> method overloads.
trans-unit.target: 若要封鎖直到作業完成為止，使用其中一種<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>方法多載。

trans-unit.target: 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步呼叫同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)

trans-unit.target: 已由伺服器呼叫來開始非同步作業，以使用指定的憑證、需求及安全性通訊協定來驗證伺服器和用戶端 (選擇性)。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="serverCertificate" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 驗證失敗，且此物件處於不穩定的狀態。

trans-unit.target: 已經進行驗證。

Server authentication using this <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> was tried previously.

Authentication is already in progress.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array that receives the bytes read from the stream.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 陣列，接收從資料流中讀取的位元組。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based location in <c>buffer</c> at which to begin storing the data read from this stream.
trans-unit.target: 「緩衝區」<c></c>中以零為起始的位置，用來開始儲存從此資料流讀取的資料。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to read from the stream.
trans-unit.target: 自資料流中讀取的最大位元組數。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that references the method to invoke when the read operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 委派，其會參考讀取作業完成時要叫用的方法。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that contains information about the read operation.
trans-unit.target: 包含讀取作業資訊的使用者定義物件。

trans-unit.source: This object is passed to the <c>asyncCallback</c> delegate when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 作業完成時，這個物件會傳遞給 <c>asyncCallback</c> 委派。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous read operation that reads data from the stream and stores it in the specified array.
trans-unit.target: 開始非同步讀取作業，這個作業會從資料流中讀取資料並將其儲存於指定的陣列中。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object that indicates the status of the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 物件，表示非同步作業的狀態。

trans-unit.source: If encryption and or signing are enabled, the read operation reads the data from the underlying stream, checks the integrity of the data, and/or decrypts it.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用加密，或簽章，讀取的作業會從基礎資料流讀取資料、 檢查資料完整性及/或加以解密。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous read operation must be completed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.EndRead%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 非同步讀取的作業必須完成呼叫<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.EndRead%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，方法由叫用`asyncCallback`委派。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block while the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 在作業完成時，這個方法不會封鎖。

trans-unit.source: To block until the operation completes, use the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.Read%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要封鎖的作業完成之前，請使用<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.Read%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)
trans-unit.target: 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步呼叫同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> class does not support multiple simultaneous read operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>類別不支援多個同時進行讀取作業。

trans-unit.source: You cannot call this method until you have successfully authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 已成功驗證之前，無法呼叫此方法。

trans-unit.source: To authenticate call one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要驗證的呼叫其中<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>，或<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>，<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates starting an asynchronous read operation.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會示範如何開始非同步的讀取的作業。

trans-unit.source: The following method is called when the read completes.
trans-unit.target: 在讀取完成時，會呼叫下列方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> <paramref name="<" /> <paramref name="0" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> <paramref name="<" /> <paramref name="0" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="-or-" /><paramref name="offset" /> > the length of <paramref name="buffer" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="-or-" /><paramref name="offset" /> > <paramref name="buffer" /> 的長度。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="offset" /> + count > the length of <paramref name="buffer" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> + count > <paramref name="buffer" /> 的長度。

trans-unit.source: The read operation failed.
trans-unit.target: 讀取作業失敗。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Encryption is in use, but the data could not be decrypted.
trans-unit.target: 使用了加密，但無法解密資料。

trans-unit.source: There is already a read operation in progress.
trans-unit.target: 已經有讀取作業正在進行中。

trans-unit.source: This object has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 此物件已關閉。

trans-unit.source: Authentication has not occurred.
trans-unit.target: 尚未執行驗證。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array that supplies the bytes to be written to the stream.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 陣列，提供將要寫入至資料流的位元組。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based location in <c>buffer</c> at which to begin reading bytes to be written to the stream.
trans-unit.target: 「緩衝區」<c></c>中以零為起始的位置，用來開始讀取將要寫入資料流的位元組。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that specifies the number of bytes to read from <c>buffer</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值，指定從「緩衝區」<c></c>中讀取的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that references the method to invoke when the write operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 委派，其會參考寫入作業完成時要叫用的方法。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that contains information about the write operation.
trans-unit.target: 包含作業資訊的使用者定義物件。

trans-unit.source: This object is passed to the <c>asyncCallback</c> delegate when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 作業完成時，這個物件會傳遞給 <c>asyncCallback</c> 委派。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous write operation that writes <see cref="T:System.Byte" />s from the specified buffer to the stream.
trans-unit.target: 開始非同步寫入作業，此作業會從指定的緩衝區寫入 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 至資料流。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object indicating the status of the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 物件，指出非同步作業的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates calling this method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> <paramref name="<" /> <paramref name="0" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> <paramref name="<" /> <paramref name="0" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="-or-" /><paramref name="offset" /> > the length of <paramref name="buffer" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="-or-" /><paramref name="offset" /> > <paramref name="buffer" /> 的長度。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="offset" /> + count > the length of <paramref name="buffer" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> + count > <paramref name="buffer" /> 的長度。

trans-unit.source: The write operation failed.
trans-unit.target: 寫入作業失敗。

trans-unit.source: There is already a write operation in progress.
trans-unit.target: 已經有寫入作業正在進行中。

trans-unit.source: This object has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 此物件已關閉。

trans-unit.source: Authentication has not occurred.
trans-unit.target: 尚未執行驗證。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that indicates whether the underlying stream is readable.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，指示基礎資料流是否可讀取。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if authentication has occurred and the underlying stream is readable; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行了驗證且基礎資料流可讀取，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If successful authentication has occurred, this property returns the value returned by invoking <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanRead%2A> on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: 如果驗證成功，這個屬性會傳回所叫用傳回的值<xref:System.IO.Stream.CanRead%2A>在基礎資料流。

trans-unit.source: The underlying stream is specified when you create an instance of the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> class.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立的執行個體時，指定基礎資料流<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>類別。

trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，指示基礎資料流是否支援逾時。

trans-unit.target: 如果基礎資料流支援逾時，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that indicates whether the certificate revocation list is checked during the certificate validation process.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，指出在憑證驗證處理期間是否檢查憑證撤銷清單。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the certificate revocation list is checked; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果檢查憑證撤銷清單，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The certificate revocation list contains certificates that have been revoked by the issuer.
trans-unit.target: 憑證撤銷清單會包含簽發者已撤銷的憑證。

trans-unit.source: Checking the list negatively impacts performance but improves application security.
trans-unit.target: 檢查清單產生負面效能影響，但可改善應用程式的安全性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates displaying the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會示範如何顯示這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that identifies the bulk encryption algorithm used by this <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，識別這個 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> 所用的大量加密演算法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType.Null> is required for the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.CipherAlgorithm%2A> property when the <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy.NoEncryption> enumeration value is used to construct a <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> instance.
trans-unit.target: 值為<xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType.Null>需要<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.CipherAlgorithm%2A>屬性時<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy.NoEncryption>列舉值用來建構<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] do not support the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType.Null> value.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)] 和[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]不支援<xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType.Null>值。

trans-unit.source: So even if the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType.Null> value is used to construct the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> instance, the <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy> property will be <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType.None>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，即使<xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType.Null>值用來建構<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>執行個體，<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy>屬性會是<xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType.None>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType.Null> value is only returned on Windows Vista and later.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType.Null> Windows Vista 和更新版本，才會傳回值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Net.Security.SslStream.CipherAlgorithm" /> property was accessed before the completion of the authentication process or the authentication process failed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Net.Security.SslStream.CipherAlgorithm" /> 屬性在驗證程序尚未完成之前即遭人存取，或是驗證程序失敗。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that specifies the strength of the algorithm, in bits.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值，指定演算法的強度 (以位元為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is zero until the authentication occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值為零，直到執行驗證。

trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回下列值之一：

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示指定的資料流的密碼編譯設定。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>參考。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何實作<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> instance returned by a call to <see cref="Overload:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 執行個體，由對 <see cref="Overload:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer" /> 的呼叫所傳回。

trans-unit.source: Ends a pending asynchronous server authentication operation started with a previous call to <see cref="Overload:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer" />.
trans-unit.target: 結束由先前呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer" /> 所開始的暫止非同步伺服器驗證作業。

trans-unit.source: If the operation has not completed, this method blocks until it does.
trans-unit.target: 如果作業尚未完成，這個方法會封鎖，直到它執行。

trans-unit.source: When the authentication succeeds, you must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services are used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>.
trans-unit.target: 當驗證成功時，您必須檢查<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsEncrypted%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsSigned%2A>屬性，以便判斷哪些安全性服務由<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A> property to determine whether mutual authentication occurred.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>屬性來判斷是否發生過相互驗證。

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive a <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>, and this <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> is no longer useable.
trans-unit.target: 如果驗證失敗時，您會收到<xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>，而這<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>是無法再使用。

trans-unit.source: You should close this object and remove all references to it so that it can be collected by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 您應該關閉這個物件，並移除所有參考，讓它可以收集在記憶體回收行程。

trans-unit.source: To perform this operation synchronously, use one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要以同步方式執行這項作業，請使用其中一種<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the algorithm used for generating message authentication codes (MACs).
trans-unit.target: 取得用於產生訊息驗證碼 (MAC) 的演算法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.HashAlgorithmType" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.HashAlgorithmType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Message authentication algorithms generate message hashes and signatures used to detect tampering and forgery.
trans-unit.target: 訊息驗證的演算法產生訊息雜湊和簽章可用來偵測竄改和偽造。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Net.Security.SslStream.HashAlgorithm" /> 屬性在驗證程序尚未完成之前即遭人存取，或是驗證程序失敗。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that identifies the strength of the hash algorithm used by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，識別這個執行個體所用之雜湊演算法的強度。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that specifies the strength of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.HashAlgorithmType" /> algorithm, in bits.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值，指定 <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.HashAlgorithmType" /> 演算法的強度 (以位元為單位)。

trans-unit.source: Valid values are 128 or 160.
trans-unit.target: 有效值為 128 或 160。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is zero until the authentication occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值為零，直到執行驗證。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that indicates whether authentication was successful.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，指示驗證是否成功。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if successful authentication occurred; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果驗證成功，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Clients authenticate by calling the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端驗證，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Servers authenticate by calling the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器驗證，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates displaying the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會示範如何顯示這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> uses data encryption.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，指示這個 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> 是否使用資料加密。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if data is encrypted before being transmitted over the network and decrypted when it reaches the remote endpoint; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料在透過網路傳輸之前加密，並在到達遠端端點時解密，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Encryption helps to protect the privacy of the data, namely it helps to ensure that while data is in transit, it cannot be deciphered by third parties.
trans-unit.target: 加密可幫助保護資料的隱私，也就是它可以協助確保，在傳輸資料時，它無法進行解譯第三方。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates displaying the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會示範如何顯示這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that indicates whether both server and client have been authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，指示伺服器和用戶端是否都已驗證。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the server has been authenticated; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果伺服器已驗證，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Mutual authentication is specified by the server when the server wants the client to provide a certificate for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 相互驗證是由伺服器當伺服器想要指定用戶端提供的憑證進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates displaying the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會示範如何顯示這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that indicates whether the local side of the connection used by this <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> was authenticated as the server.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，指示這個 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> 使用之連接的本機端是否以伺服器的身分驗證。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the local endpoint was successfully authenticated as the server side of the authenticated connection; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果本機端點已成功以已驗證的連接之伺服器端的身分驗證，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If authentication failed or did not occur, this property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果驗證失敗，或未執行，這個屬性會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: To authenticate as the server, call the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要與伺服器進行驗證，呼叫<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that indicates whether the data sent using this stream is signed.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，指示使用此資料流傳送的資料是否簽章。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the data is signed before being transmitted; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料在傳輸前簽章，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Data signing helps to protect the integrity of the data, namely it helps the recipient determine whether the data has been tampered with while in transit.
trans-unit.target: 資料簽章協助保護資料的完整性，也就是它會協助判斷是否資料已遭竄改傳輸中的收件者。

trans-unit.source: The key exchange algorithm protects information used to generate shared keys.

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值，指定 <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExchangeAlgorithmType" /> 演算法的強度 (以位元為單位)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: 取得基礎資料流的長度。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Int64" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int64" />。

trans-unit.source: The length of the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: 基礎資料流的長度。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the value returned by invoking <xref:System.IO.Stream.Length%2A> on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回所叫用傳回的值<xref:System.IO.Stream.Length%2A>在基礎資料流。

trans-unit.source: If the underlying stream is not seekable, this method typically throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果基礎資料流不是可搜尋，這個方法通常就會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The run-time type of the underlying stream determines the run-time type of the exception that is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 基礎資料流的執行階段類型會決定執行階段類型，就會擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Getting the value of this property is not supported when the underlying stream is a <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream" />.
trans-unit.target: 當基礎資料流為 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream" /> 時，不支援取得這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the certificate used to authenticate the local endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 取得用於驗證本機端點的憑證。

trans-unit.source: An X509Certificate object that represents the certificate supplied for authentication or <see langword="null" /> if no certificate was supplied.
trans-unit.target: X509Certificate 物件，表示提供用於驗證的憑證或 <see langword="null" /> (如果沒有提供憑證的話)。

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定基礎資料流中目前的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Int64" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int64" />。

trans-unit.source: The current position in the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: 在基礎資料流中的目前位置。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the value returned by invoking <xref:System.IO.Stream.Position%2A> on the underlying stream.

trans-unit.source: The run-time type of the underlying stream determines the run-time type of the exception that is thrown.

trans-unit.target: 不支援這個屬性的設定。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Getting the value of this property is not supported when the underlying stream is a <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream" />.
trans-unit.target: 當基礎資料流為 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream" /> 時，不支援取得這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array that receives the bytes read from this stream.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 陣列，接收從此資料流中讀取的位元組。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> that contains the zero-based location in <c>buffer</c> at which to begin storing the data read from this stream.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，包含 <c>buffer</c> 中以零為起始的位置，用來開始儲存從此資料流中讀取的資料。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> that contains the maximum number of bytes to read from this stream.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，包含要從此資料流中讀取的最大位元組數。

trans-unit.source: Reads data from this stream and stores it in the specified array.
trans-unit.target: 從這個資料流中讀取資料並將其儲存於指定的陣列中。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that specifies the number of bytes read.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值，指定讀取的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: When there is no more data to be read, returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果不再有要讀取的資料，則傳回 0。

trans-unit.source: The method reads a maximum of `count` bytes from the stream and stores them in `buffer` beginning at `offset`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法會讀取最多`count`從資料流的位元組並將其儲存在`buffer`開始`offset`。

trans-unit.source: You cannot perform multiple simultaneous read operations.
trans-unit.target: 您無法執行多個同時進行讀取的作業。

trans-unit.source: You cannot call this method until you have successfully authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 已成功驗證之前，無法呼叫此方法。

trans-unit.source: To authenticate call one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要驗證的呼叫其中<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>，或<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>，<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.target: 若要以非同步方式執行此操作，使用<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginRead%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the value returned by invoking <xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadTimeout%2A> on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回所叫用傳回的值<xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadTimeout%2A>在基礎資料流。

trans-unit.source: When you set this property, the <xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadTimeout%2A> value on the underlying stream is set to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 當您設定此屬性，<xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadTimeout%2A>基礎資料流上的值設定為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: If the underlying stream is a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>, <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.ReadTimeout%2A> is in milliseconds and is set to <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite> by default so that read operations do not timeout.
trans-unit.target: 如果基礎資料流<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>，<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.ReadTimeout%2A>以毫秒為單位，並設定為<xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>依預設，讓讀取作業並不會逾時。
